report.title: Bunk Ass Crap
report.author: Special K
report.bodytext: I decided to trade some nugs for some opium. I had tried a tiny ass bit on a bowl with some of said nugs. It was red and very different from the last time I got some (black O) a few years back. Unfortunelately I was relying on my friend with the shit not to be a fuckin idiot. Wasn't sure sbout it so decided to try more. Got 4.8 grams. Packed 3 bongs with a mix of nugs and burnt it all up. I thought I felt some additional effects but wasn't sure. Twenty minutes after smoking I read up online and found the articles on this fake ass shit. Then I fully comprehended my situation.
